short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple notes extension with multiple sections, word count, dark mode and import and export functionality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick Notes is designed for your convenience and won’t bloat your browser—it's small yet incredibly useful. Whether you're writing an email or copying facts, it has you covered. Your notes are automatically saved, so you won’t lose important information. Plus, you can manually save and load your notes to and from your device whenever you need.
